title: "New AI Study Links Learning Disabilities to Brain Hubs"
excerpt: "Learning disabilities in children is not uncommon. Seven million or 14 percent of all public school students in the U.S. between the ages of 3-21 years old received special education services under the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA) in 2017-18 according to a National Center for Education Statistics 2019 report."
